page.title: 09HEALTH
page.content: This area is served by 9 doctors surgeries, 7 dentists, 2 opticians and a small health clinic. There is a larger health centre in Maghull which serves Melling, Aintree, Netherton, Lydiate and Maghull areas. Although there are no general hospitals, the area is well served by hospitals at Fazakerley (4 miles away), Walton (6) and Ormskirk (8 miles away). Residents can travel to these hospitals by public and private transport. There are hospitals and homes for epileptics in the block, on the periphery of which are 2 special hospitals accommodating mentally ill patients; at Moss Side and Park Lane.Park Lane is l of the 4 special hospitals in the country for patients needing security.
